trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Las Cruces
There were no other sightings in Las Cruces on or around January 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night (1-12-10) we saw amber-colored lights fade into view and then fade out at around 7:15 PM. They were due north of our location, above and a little to the left of a radio tower. Very brief sighting, but 3 in a row and then two together. No sound, no running lights and no movement. We've had a previous similar sighting and are working with a MUFON investigator on this one (John Fegel, 9302).
